name: SHOOT'EM UP (waza_Dev)
description:
Shoot'em up is a retro style fps prototype. It is a still in early development and only has one wave based level. Feedback highly appreciated

CONTROLS

WASD - MOVEMENT

LMB - shoot left weapon

RMB - shoot right weapon

SPACE - jump

F - kick

Q - pick up left hand weapon

E - pick up right hand weapon

P - pause

R - restart level

ESC - main menu

Music By NOmAb: https://www.youtube.com/c/NOmAbMusic
